cvbyte.desc: Base Address (6 LSB of accessory decoder address)
cvbyte.info: Decoder address low byte in range of 1-63.
manufacturer's version number. (2.1.3 or 213
NMRA assignedmanufacturer's id number. Rpi=13 (DIY and PD devices)
Decoder address high byte - range of 0-7.
Configuration data (128 for accessory decoder).
Servo 1 start point LSB (LED 'off' value)
Servo 1 MSB start point (LED 'off' value)
Servo 1 LSB end point (LED 'on' brightness level
Servo 1 MSB end point (LED 'on' brightness level)
Servo 1 Speed. 1/5000 second ticks (delay) between servo steps. (n * 0.2 milliseconds.)
Servo 1 step. Because there are 4096 steps between fully OFF and Fully On, we need to count by 'n' to obtain instant ON or OFF.
Servo 2 start point LSB (LED 'off' value)
Servo 2 MSB start point (LED 'off' value)
Servo 2 LSB end point (LED 'on' brightness level
Servo 2 MSB end point (LED 'on' brightness level)
Servo 2 Speed. 1/5000 second ticks (delay) between servo steps. (n * 0.2 milliseconds.)
Servo 2 step. Because there are 4096 steps between fully OFF and Fully On, we need to count by 'n' to obtain instant ON or OFF.
